channel.description: Recent content on Today's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: August 3, 2023 Today's Verse Hebrews 13:16 [16] Do not neglect to do good and to share what you have, for such sacrifices are pleasing to God. Today's Memory Verse Matthew 28:19-20 - Go therefore and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, teaching them to observe all that I have commanded you. And behold, I am with you always, to the end of the age.
